TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit InstancePersistenceException extends System.Exception

Docs.summary: Base class for all the persistence related exception classes. The and the are derived classes of this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An InstancePersistenceException that is not an InstanceOwnerException nor an InstancePersistenceCommandException applies to the persistence provider itself and may indicate an unrecoverable failure condition of the provider.
